DataElement.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite 4 Past 4 Weeks Ability to Control Urination Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation in the past 4 weeks of their urinary control, using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Past 4 Weeks Ability to Control Urination Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to evaluate patient function and bother after prostate cancer treatment._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._A question about an individual's ability to control their urination._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to evaluate patient function and bother after prostate cancer treatment.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to evaluate patient function and bother after prostate cancer treatment.

Property.preferredName: Past 4 Weeks Ability to Control Urination Score

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present.
A question about an individual's ability to control their urination.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard related to urinary control associated with the EPIC measure.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had no urinary control.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had no urinary control.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual frequently dribbles urine.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual frequently dribbles urine.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual occasionally dribbles urine.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual occasionally dribbles urine.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had total urinary control.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had total urinary control.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Which of the following best d
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which of the following best describes your urinary control during the last 4 weeks?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Medidata ePRO CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This CDE has been validated for use with the Medidata Rave ePRO module.
